sourceDesc.p: Bibliografische Angaben eines in Druck erschienen Texts von Bahr

biblStruct.note: Thomas Mann, the author of Buddenbrooks and of Der Tod in Venedig (Death in Venice), has long been highly regarded by lovers of literature.
Hermann Bahr: A Letter from Germany. Munich. In: The London Mercury, Jg. 8, Nr. 46, August 1923, S. 424–426.
